articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: 2023 World Cup won't be Rob Walter's cross to bear, says CSA's Nkwe
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's director of cricket Enoch Nkwe said newly appointed Proteas white-ball coach Rob Walter won't be strictly judged on the 2023 World Cup that'll be hosted by India later this year.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa's director of cricket Enoch Nkwe said newly-appointed Proteas white-ball coach Rob Walter wouldn't be judged on the 2023 World Cup.

articles.title: CSA chief Moseki notes 'open' Proteas coaching hunt was vital to regaining broader trust
articles.description: Cricket South Africa (CSA) believe their comprehensive recruitment process not only brought them the two best candidates to coach the Proteas, but put pushed them further on the path to respectability.

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
